title: Reconnecting problem
body:
After lobby ends its showing me that i can reconnect to game 
loading screen is not even showing.
nothing happens when i press reconnect
i try to repair but it didn't help
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: This kind of thing usually happens when your network can't get a strong enough connection with the game servers. Using that HRT like Galacius mentioned can help correctly configure your firewall settings and such, but let's go one step further and double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.

Hello Rorsch,

You said you already tried to repair but have you used the hextech repair tool here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs and see that works?
